## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I'm really interested in bridging some of my cryptocurrencies from other blockchains to the Verus blockchain. How do I bridge cryptocurrencies like ETH, DAI, or MKR from another blockchain to the Verus blockchain?

**AI Assistant:**
To bridge cryptocurrencies like ETH, DAI, or MKR from another blockchain to the Verus blockchain, you need to follow these steps: First, choose the cryptocurrency you want to bridge over (ETH, DAI, MKR, or VRSC). Next, choose the destination (Verus blockchain). Then, enter the amount you want to bridge. Finally, click send. After that, follow the next steps guided by Metamask or WalletConnect. Do you have any questions about this process?

**User:**
That sounds pretty straightforward. How long does it take for bridged cryptocurrencies to arrive in my Verus wallet?

**AI Assistant:**
It can take up to 45 minutes for bridged ETH, DAI, or MKR to arrive on the Verus blockchain and in your wallet. Just be patient, and you'll see the funds in your wallet soon. Do you have any other questions about bridging currencies?

**User:**
Actually, I do. How can I view bridged currencies like vETH, DAI.vETH, and MKR.vETH in Verus Desktop?

**AI Assistant:**
To view bridged currencies like vETH, DAI.vETH, and MKR.vETH in Verus Desktop, follow these steps: First, go to the "Multiverse" tab. Next, click on Verus on the left. Then, click on one of the bridged currencies (e.g., vETH). Click the "Add Currency" button. Repeat for all bridged currencies you want to add. Finally, go back to the "Wallet" tab. You can now see the added currencies in the dropdown menu.

**User:**
What about viewing bridged currencies in Verus Mobile? How do I do that?

**AI Assistant:**
To view bridged currencies like vETH, DAI.vETH, and MKR.vETH in Verus Mobile, follow these steps: First, click the big plus button in the right bottom corner. Next, click "Add PBaaS Currency". Then, type in vETH (or DAI.vETH, MKR.vETH, depending on what you want to add). Finally, follow the steps to add the currency to your main screen.

**User:**
One last question. How do I preconvert currencies to Bridge.vETH in Verus Desktop?

**AI Assistant:**
To preconvert currencies to Bridge.vETH in Verus Desktop, follow these steps: First, click on "Convert Currencies". Next, go to "Advanced". Finally, follow the steps to preconvert your currencies to Bridge.vETH. Do you have any more questions about using Verus?

N/A
How do I bridge cryptocurrencies like ETH, DAI, or MKR from another blockchain to the Verus blockchain?

To bridge cryptocurrencies like ETH, DAI, or MKR from another blockchain to the Verus blockchain, you need to follow these steps:

1. Choose the cryptocurrency you want to bridge over (ETH, DAI, MKR, or VRSC).
2. Choose the destination (Verus blockchain).
3. Enter the amount you want to bridge.
4. Click send.

Then, follow the next steps guided by Metamask or WalletConnect.

Then choose what you want to bridge over (ETH, DAI, MKR or VRSC). And then the destination. After that choose the amount and click send.
Metamask or WalletConnect will guide you through the next steps. ⚠️ It can take up to 45 minutes before your bridged ETH, DAI or MKR arrives on the Verus blockchain and in your wallet.
⛽ Also, the gas fee calculation is quite high, it could be that you pay a lot less, but this is never a guarantee.
Getting Verus Desktop to show vETH, DAI.vETH & MKR.vETH
Now that you have sent over ETH, DAI or MKR to your R- or i-address, we need to make sure you can actually see them in Verus Desktop.Go to the “Multiverse”-tab, click on Verus on the left. You can see that Bridge.vETH, DAI.vETH, MKR.vETH & vETH or not “added” yet. Click on one of the currencies.When clicking on one of the currencies you can see a button “Add Currency”. Click on it, and do it for all if you want.
You can now go back to the “Wallet”-tab.You can now see the added currencies in the dropdown in your Wallet-tab (when Verus is selected).
Getting Verus Mobile to show vETH, DAI.vETH & MKR.vETH
For this step we assume you already have the wallet installed and are ready to go. Now that you have sent over ETH, DAI or MKR to your R- or i-address, we need to make sure you can actually see them in Verus Mobile.Click on the big plus button in the right bottom corner. Then click “Add PBaaS Currency”.
Then you can type in vETH (or DAI.vETH, MKR.vETH depending on what you want to add). (not capital sensitive). Btw, you can also already add Bridge.vETH.
Follow the steps and the currency will be added to your main screen.
Preconverting to Bridge.vETH
Verus Desktop
To actually start preconverting currencies to Bridge.vETH click on “Convert Currencies”.Now go to “Advanced”.
